pkgmetadata.longdescription: # SQL Field Report## InstallationTo install use pip:`pip install sql-field-report`## UsageSQL Field Report is a [Typer](https://github.com/tiangolo/typer) CLI tool to see the available functions run:`sql-field-report --help````MSSQL Database ReportGenerate an excel report summarising the data in an MSSQL DatabaseArgs: server (str): The SQL server name port (int): The SQL server port user (str): Your SQL Server username password (str): Your SQL Server password database_name (str): The name of the database to analyse schema (str): The schema for the database tables to analyse output_file_name (str): The output file name of the report```
